elem.description: This block represents three-phase short circuit that triggers at T_on moment of simulation time.
elem.name: Three phase fault

Equations.equ: p1.p[1] = Z.p + if(gr(time, fTime), R_on, R_off) * p1.f[1]
p1.p[2] = Z.p + if(gr(time, fTime), R_on, R_off) * p1.f[2]
p1.p[3] = Z.p + if(gr(time, fTime), R_on, R_off) * p1.f[3]
